data.text: @njassemblydems Then you fire them if they don’t follow your mandates. You guys suck!

@njassemblydems Selfless, heroes fighting the frontlines from 3/2020 until present day. But they’re not selfless or heroes if they make their own medical choices. They’re just the opposite; fired, selfish villains. 🙄
@njassemblydems You mean the ones you let @GovMurphy force into accepting the 💉 or lose their jobs? That’s how you thank your so called heroes?
